name: quotation-view-system
description: Implements quotation view system with table display and filtering capabilities

changes.description: Created quotationViewPanel with table structure and filter inputs in headers
changes.impact: Users can view all quotations in a structured table format with real-time filtering

changes.description: Implemented localStorage-based quotation persistence system with JSON storage, unique IDs, and timestamps
changes.impact: Quotations persist across browser sessions without requiring backend database

changes.description: Added initializeQuotationViewPanel(), displayQuotations(), applyQuotationFilters(), viewQuotationDetails(), saveQuotationToStorage(), and loadQuotationsFromStorage()
changes.impact: Complete quotation management functionality with CRUD operations

changes.description: Implemented real-time filtering with text filters (customer, contact, email, phone), dropdown filter (product type), numeric filters (quantity, total), and date filter (creation date)
changes.impact: Users can quickly find specific quotations using multiple filter criteria

changes.description: Created click-to-view modal displaying customer information, product details, pricing information, notes, and creation date
changes.impact: Users can view complete quotation details without leaving the table view

changes.description: Structured table with columns: Customer Name, Contact Person, Email, Phone, Product Type, Quantity, Total (HKD), Date Created
changes.impact: Clear presentation of key quotation information for quick scanning

author: Development Team
